example: She adhered to her principles/ideals throughout her life.

meaning: nhật ký công tác, chương trình nghị sự
example: There were several important items on the agenda.
She's always bringing up her health problems.
She concluded the speech by reminding us of our responsibility.

meaning: (v) tiến hành, (n) sự tiến bộ, sự được phép
example: We've received permission to go ahead with the music festival in spite of opposition from local residents.
Black kicked/headed the ball into/towards the goal.
Could I talk to you about a personal matter?
The equipment should be tested periodically.

meaning: (n) ‹sự› tiến bộ, phát triển, (v) tiến tới, tiến triển
example: Technological progress has been so rapid over the last few years.
That meeting achieved absolutely nothing - it was a complete waste of time.
